name: Ofzafe.GitHub.io
body:
# How to install Maven on Ubuntu

![mvn-logo](http://maven.apache.org/images/apache-maven-project-2.png)

### Download Maven

Download Maven at [Download](http://maven.apache.org/download.cgi). Choose the binary version.

### Extract Maven

`tar xvfz apache-maven-X.X.X.bin.tar.gz`

Move the folder to the recently created to /usr/local

`sudo mv -R apache-maven-X.X.X /usr/local`

### Configure the PATH

`export /usr/local/apache-maven-X.X.X/bin:$PATH`

_Enjoy Maven!_
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
